summary: Scheduled maintenance, risk of loss of external connectivity

updates.details: Relocation of PDUs in cloud firewall rack between 08:30 and 10:00. Risk of loss of external connectivity of up to 15 mins.

summary: Expired server certificate caused break in service

updates.details: Cerificate expired over weekend, now replaced, normal service resumed.
In preparation for scheduled maintenance on Monday morning 29 April, tape services (ET, JDMA, NLA, SD) will be taken down Thursday 25th at 16:30, but should return later on Monday.
Reports received re. CEDA archive volumes and some /gws/nopw/j04 GWS volumes. Under investigation.
